name: Scamalytics
description: View the Scamalytics fraud score for IP Addresses

options.name: Scamalytics Organization or Account Name
options.description: Your Scamalytics Organization or Account name

options.name: Scamalytics API Key
options.description: API Key for the Scamalytics Fraud API

options.name: Minimum Fraud Score
options.description: Minimum Fraud Score to be notified on, values range from 0-100.  Defaults to 0.

options.name: Baseline Investigation Threshold
options.description: Minimum Fraud Score for an IP to be (0-100) for an "investigation threshold met" icon to be displayed in the summary tag.  Setting this value to -1 turns off the threshold. Defaults to 100.
